an6.114:1.3: Lack of contentment, lack of situational awareness, and having many wishes.
an6.114:1.5: To give up these three things you should develop three things.
an6.114:1.7: You should develop contentment to give up lack of contentment, situational awareness to give up lack of situational awareness, and having few wishes to give up having many wishes.
an6.114:1.8: These are the three things you should develop to give up those three things.”
